sentences.en: a police interview
sentences.cn: 警方问讯

sentences.en: a portfolio of work presented at interview
sentences.cn: 在面试时呈递的工作成果样本

sentences.en: Allan gave an interview to the Chicago Tribune newspaper last month.
sentences.cn: 艾伦上个月接受了《芝加哥论坛报》的采访。

sentences.en: an exclusive interview
sentences.cn: 独家采访

sentences.en: an interview for a job on the Los Angeles Times
sentences.cn: 《洛杉矶时报》的一次求职面试

sentences.en: Elton John gave an interview to Barbara Walters (= he answered her questions ).
sentences.cn: 埃尔顿 · 约翰接受了芭芭拉 · 沃尔特斯的采访。

sentences.en: Gregory would interview them, and would play one off against the other.
sentences.cn: 格雷戈里会采访他们，并会挑动他们彼此相斗。

sentences.en: I seized the chance to interview Chris Hani about this issue.
sentences.cn: 我抓住机会就这一问题采访了克里斯·哈尼。

sentences.en: I'd interviewed him often in the past.
sentences.cn: 我过去经常采访他。

sentences.en: In the interview he gave some grounds for optimism.
sentences.cn: 他接受采访时阐述了持乐观态度的理由。

sentences.en: Mark had told me that he was down for an interview.
sentences.cn: 马克已告诉我他要参加一场面试。

sentences.en: Other rarities include an interview with Presley.
sentences.cn: 其他的稀罕事包括对普雷斯利的采访。

sentences.en: Rehearse and role-play the interview with a friend beforehand.
sentences.cn: 事先和朋友通过角色扮演排练一下面试。

sentences.en: She fluffed her interview at Oxford.
sentences.cn: 她在牛津的面试搞砸了。

sentences.en: She has just taped an interview.
sentences.cn: 她刚录制完一次采访。

sentences.en: She was late for the interview after being hauled up for speeding.
sentences.cn: 由于超速驾车被拦下，她面试迟到了。

sentences.en: The interview was painful to watch.
sentences.cn: 观看那次访谈让人难堪。

sentences.en: The interview went out over the airways.
sentences.cn: 采访通过电台和电视台播出。

sentences.en: The publicity-shy singer spoke frankly in his first interview in three years.
sentences.cn: 这位不喜欢抛头露面的歌手在3年来的首次访谈中畅所欲言。

sentences.en: There'll be an interview with Mr Brown after the news.
sentences.cn: 新闻过后播出的是对布朗先生的访谈。

sentences.en: We’re interviewing six candidates for the job.
sentences.cn: 这份工作我们要面试六名申请人。

sentences.en: When I met her, she had just returned from a job interview.
sentences.cn: 我遇见她时，她刚参加完一场求职面试回来。

sentences.en: When Wardell was interviewed, he was impressive, and on that basis, he was hired.
sentences.cn: 当沃德尔接受面试时，他给人印象深刻，因此他被雇用了。

words.tran_cn: 会见者；面谈者；进行面试者
采访；接见；对…进行面谈；对某人进行面试

phrases.tran_cn: 对顾客需要的深入查询
个人面谈；面谈调查；私人的会谈
结构化面试；结构式访谈
n. （对考生进行的）口头审查；非结构化面试；非结构性面谈

trans.tran_en: a formal meeting at which someone is asked questions in order to find out whether they are suitable for a job, course of study etc

trans.tran_cn: 采访； 会见； 面试
trans.tran_en: a formal meeting at which someone is asked questions in order to find out whether they are suitable for a job, course of study etc

trans.tran_cn: 接见， 会见； 面谈， 面试； 采访
trans.tran_en: a formal meeting at which someone is asked questions in order to find out whether they are suitable for a job, course of study etc
to ask someone questions during an interview

trans.tran_cn: 接见， 会见； 采访； 面试
trans.tran_en: a formal meeting at which someone is asked questions in order to find out whether they are suitable for a job, course of study etc

trans.tran_cn: 接见， 会见， 采访
trans.tran_en: When a journalist interviews someone such as a famous person, they ask them a series of questions
